room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Tewksbury in Boston
review: The escape room - Murder Mansion - was extremely fun and challenging. Kacie, our game master and escapologist, was the best. She explained all the rules thoroughly and answered all our questions.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Tewksbury in Boston
review: Soo much fun as a small team and harder than you think! We didn't make it in the Murder Mansion. BUT we will next time! We're coming to get you guys.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Tewksbury in Boston
review: Great visit to escapology. Did the murder mansion room and it was awesome. Meg and kelly made it very fun and welcoming. Would recommend!
